attributes.action: Award John Smeaton an OBE for Bravery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Sat 1st July 2007 an attempted terrorist attack took place at Glasgow International Airport.  John Smeaton, an airport baggage handler managed to restrain one of the attackers.  This is a remarkable act of bravery an we call on the Prime Minister to award Mr Smeaton an OBE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
